esqlQuery.esql:
// The recommended threshold value for slow queries is > 500, and the alerting rule is grouped by host name, query id and schema name. You can adjust the threshold value by modifying the p95_ms value in the WHERE clause, which is specified in milliseconds.
FROM metrics-mysql.performance-default
| STATS p95_ms = max(`mysql.performance.events_statements.quantile.95`/1e9) BY host.name, mysql.performance.events_statements.query_id, mysql.performance.events_statements.schemaname
| WHERE p95_ms > 500
